website_summaries.verdict: The Adicross Classic satisfies golfers’ modern demands of having more practical pieces. Gone are the days when golf shoes were limited by the course. Possessing minimal styling and features that promise what it claims, this golf shoe is an all-around piece that performs in style.
pros: Many reviewers claim that the Adicross Classic is a comfortable golf shoe
A great number of purchasers affirm that this athletic-styled footwear is extremely versatile
It can be worn on and off the golf course
Several have observed that there is no break-in time required for this shoe
Some find that this gear from the Adicross collection is easy to clean because of its smooth leather upper
First-time users of this spikeless golf shoe have been surprised that it delivers traction on both wet and dry conditions
The price can’t be beaten given its features, said a sizable amount of customers
cons: A small number of individuals complain about the tongue ripping off
One wishes the item to be waterproof as it is quite impractical acts like a sponge during morning rounds

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about golfing in them, just didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I got fat feet, there I said it. These may be labeled 'wide', but not enough for me. I'm always looking for clean, basic, wide, white shoes. If you're like me, best I've found are Land's End canvas sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Stylish universal golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry to get a pair of golf shoes and opted for these. They are very stylish and gives a good grip on the course, despite not having much of a spike-like sole. I've even worn them to work. However, if you seek ultimate comfort and willing to pay more, then there are other shoes more suitable.
customer_reviews.author: mitoboru

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Shoe and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit is perfect. Like wearing sneakers on a golf course and oh yes, these shoes are a great value. No need to spend $100 or more for a comfortable dependable golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Pie.

customer_reviews.title: Way too short.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe BUT way too small. I wear a 9 shoe. I have a narrow foot so I liked the width but these were at least a half size too short. Maybe a full size. My toe was JAMMED into the end.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdberfel

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good price, solid traction, could be more comfortable in the insole
customer_reviews.text: Look good, decent price. Comfort in the insole could be improved. Little worried about how the suede will hold up over time, but I'll update the review after I've worn them a little longer. Assuming they last a while, the four-star rating is more about the lack of comfort in the inner shoe and insole. Little more cushion would go a long way for 18 holes in the hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: OBWK

customer_reviews.title: Love my new golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love my new golf shoes!!! I actually did something that I normally don't do with brand new shoes and that was walk the course instead of ride. In the past other new golf shoes have torn up my feet trying to walk the course with them the first time out. These were very comfortable! They fit great, I do have narrow feet. Very happy with my purchase! Would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Tomybiggirl

customer_reviews.title: Great golf and everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these shoes I have bought. I'm glad I got the half size larger as they are much more comfortable than the first. No break in time was required either. I have a wierd foot with a narrow heel so most shoes slip and I get a blister. Not these, the fit is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Srcla10

customer_reviews.title: My husband LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome! Such a stylish golf shoe. He's gotten tons of compliments on them too. They fit just perfect and are very well made. I wouldn't say they are expensive when you think about something in the long run. These will last him forever! We are so glad we found these and would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: K.Palmy

customer_reviews.title: they can be used everyday not only to play golf
customer_reviews.text: my husband loved them even if they are actually golf shoes
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Tos

customer_reviews.title: Best looking, fitting, pair of golf shoes ever ... at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe owned - ever, stepped right in and have been playing lots of golf in them, including two 36 hole days ... Style: I had a buddy ask me if they were “Stan Smiths” - just as comfortable was my reply - I love the corfam line texture!! If these guys last a while , the price was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love my new golf kicks
customer_reviews.text: They feel like normal shoes on the course. The spikes offer plenty of grip on the green and they are comfortable on the tee box. I highly recommend these to all casual styled golfers out there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wear Them Anywhere...Even to Church on Sunday!
customer_reviews.text: Wear these anywhere! Golf course, traveling on the airplane, just going shopping and trying to find the right shoe to go with your jeans. Great product and wonderful support.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight L. Short

customer_reviews.title: Love Adidas adicross
customer_reviews.text: I love these adidas adicross golf shoes. They're not stiff and don't require numerous rounds get broken in. Slip them on for the first time and you're ready to go. Really easy to clean so they look good for your next round.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: The she is very comfortable and has a nice, clean and simple look.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good looking shoe. Ordered 1/2 a size up as recommended by others who purchased the shoe and it’s a great fit. Broke them in walking 18 holes and so far so good. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Arrigoni

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, the only Adidas I’ve found to be comfortable with a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Stoetzel

customer_reviews.title: Not for Boomers.
customer_reviews.text: Totally cool. It’s so nice to show up at the golf course in some “non stereotypical golf shoes”... all the old dudes were like... are those golf shoes? I was like... yes, boomer.
customer_reviews.author: Letty Garza

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Great quality and very comfortable and great ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Great quality and very comfortable and great out on the course. Now if I could only buy a case of straight balls I'd be all set!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Andy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Golf Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are amazing! They look like regular Addidas sneakers, are very comfortable and grip very well for having integrated cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Miller

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price. The reset my 8 year old grows, I just don’t like to spend a lot on golf shoes so I went with these. Love that I was able to find wide golf shoes. They’re working out very well for him.
customer_reviews.author: DenaCher

customer_reviews.title: Light and slightly small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very different from the Footjoys I have worn in the past. The Adidas is lighter and smaller (most noticeable when getting into the shoe and tying the laces. Nevertheless, they are very comfortable and give good support on the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Shaddock

customer_reviews.title: ... was small had to return ) now they fit good not a bad deal
customer_reviews.text: Went a size up ( first order was small had to return ) now they fit good not a bad deal
customer_reviews.author: Robert N

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: one of the most comfortable golf shoes I've owned over 30 years of golfing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Barnes

customer_reviews.title: So fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. I wear them to, from and around the course. Feels like normal

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Left pair had Adidas message on side of shoe written in french and right pair in German not sure if that’s how the originals are. Shoe fits well but sole of my feet hurt after 18.. guess not comfortable for 18 holes. Looks good and can be worn on and off
customer_reviews.author: Davidjones

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes. I am a Stan Smith devotee and this shoe is the golf equivalent for fit and comfort. And a great looking shoe. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Wide is not wide anough
customer_reviews.text: I purchased wide and they still ran narrow - not by much but not a true wide - a shame

customer_reviews.title: These are great golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great golf shoes. The traction is fantastic on the greens. I purchased these for the look and price and was very surprised by the quality and traction of these Adidas golf shoes. You won't regret buying these .

customer_reviews.title: This pair did not fit!
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered several pair of the same style shoe. this pair did not fit. too small

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tongue of the shoe ripped off first time playing in them. Nothing super glue couldn’t fix, but still not impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe, they loosen up after a few wears
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviews, they are a bit tight when you first put them on, but after wearing them for a while they get loosened up and feel much better. I love the shoe and intend on purchasing a few more pairs in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Strub

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable...True to size...good grip
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking retro shoe. Very comfortable on and off course. Foot felt supported. Definitely a medium width fit. This is not a shoe for a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: richerod

customer_reviews.title: fitting issues
customer_reviews.text: Look great! Quality material. the heel slips off too easily. They are narrow too

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are soo comfortable right out of the box, you could wear these as a daily wear shoe, not just for golf.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, but I haven't been able to use the yet. Seen to fit well and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kena

customer_reviews.title: Saved a lot by ordering from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Good looking . Wore directly out of box to golf course. Price was much less than local big golf retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Boy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for the golf course
customer_reviews.text: Look great, pretty comfortable. After two hours on the range, I could feel the insoles flattening out an feeling a bit less comfortable. If they get worse I'll update the review. Keep in mind these are an older version, I believe the Adicross II are the ones I tried on in the store and was what I thought I was ordering. Did not realize my mistake until after the order was placed, but I will stick with them. If you are worried about traction with the small nub type spikes, fear not. These were my first golf shoes of this type and I think they provide even better grip than a soft-spike shoe.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are fantastic. Extremely comfortable and very stylish. Great traction also. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Small

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes that look and feel like running shoes

customer_reviews.title: it took about 12 holes before they started to feel right.
customer_reviews.text: it took about 12 holes before they started to feel right. I wore them a couple days later and they felt perfect all day long- very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1/2 size larger and they fit as expected with heavy socks. Comfortable to use on the course and water-resistant. No more lost cleats to replace!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic golf shoes

customer_reviews.text: For me, shoe ran small, too tight to wear! I re-ordered and had a larger size at my door within a week! They fit! It was easy to return original pair!

customer_reviews.title: Cozy shoes, great grip.

customer_reviews.text: Feels great but the only thing I did wrong was ordering the white pair. If I had to do it over again, I would get the black.. it looks more presentable when dirty!

And they go good with my Levi's work pants that I bought previous look in my other reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are NOT white and grey
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat unhappy. Shoes are listed as white and in the picture they look to be white and grey. They are white and beige which I was not expecting. Comfortable, just not what I thought I was buying

customer_reviews.text: Adidas shoes run at least a half size too small consistently. I love the shoes but can't wear them and a slightly larger size wasn't available.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes at great price
customer_reviews.text: I found these shoes in a shoe store at a 40% off sale. I tried them on and liked them. Just for the heck of it, I did a search on Amazon for the exact same shoes and found them at a much cheaper price than the sale price at the store. Since I had already tried them on, I knew the fit would be perfect. I left the store and ordered the shoes from my cell phone app. They arrived as expected and fit as expected. Great, comfortable shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Adicross Classic Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Spikeless golf shoe featuring classic adidas-inspired design with unique color, texture, and upper material selection.
feature_bullets: Multiple offerings of climastorm water resistant leather and breathable heathered textile upper
Highly-Flexible adiwear spikeless outsole with pure motion features 72 strategically-placed lugs for green-friendliness, optimal grip, and wear anywhere versatility
Lightweight cloud foam sock liner with extra EVA cushion underneath provides ultra-light cushioning and comfort
